comment: Yeah. That's why I'm holding a Swastika flag and calling for Dugin to be thrown in a volcano. Totally makes sense.
amr:
# ::snt Yeah. That's why I'm holding a Swastika flag and calling for Dugin to be thrown in a volcano. Totally makes sense.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (y / yeah
            :mode expressive)
      :snt2 (c / cause-01
            :ARG0 (t / that)
            :ARG1 (a / and
                  :op1 (h / hold-01
                        :ARG0 (ii / i)
                        :ARG1 (f / flag
                              :mod (p / person
                                    :name (n / name
                                          :op1 "Swastika"))))
                  :op2 (c2 / call-03
                        :ARG0 ii
                        :ARG1 (t2 / throw-01
                              :ARG1 (p2 / person
                                    :name (n2 / name
                                          :op1 "Dugin"))
                              :ARG2 (v / volcano)))))
      :snt3 (s / sense-02
            :degree (t3 / total)))

                  :ARG3 (m3 / more)
